name: Pottis Dream Forge
description:
Pottis Dream Forge is a text-based RPG that aims to recapture the experience given through traditional games of the genre. In this game, you take control of a man with no memory of his past, beyond his name. Freedom of choice is the main focus, allowing the player to take as many actions as imaginable. Your choices will wildly change the story far beyond the scope you're used to. Discover your past and forge your future.

There are no pictures.
There is no sound.

Just you, the command line, and endless possibilities.
